title: The day only one F1 car took the Hungarian GP start
summary: The 2021 Hungarian Grand Prix delivered one of the most bizarre moments in F1 history - a restart with just one car on the grid. Here's how that happened

qa_pairs.question: In which year did the Hungarian Grand Prix feature a restart with only one car on the grid?
What unusual event occurred during the 2021 Hungarian Grand Prix?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Only one car took the start.
wrong_options: Multiple cars crashed before the start
The race was canceled due to weather

qa_pairs.question: Which team was likely to be involved in a scenario where only one car could restart a race?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Any F1 team with a single car remaining on the grid.
